Transaction ID.semantic_description: A unique identifier for each transaction, ensuring each sale is distinct.

Item.semantic_description: The specific food or drink item sold during the transaction.

Quantity.semantic_description: The number of units of the item purchased in this transaction.

Price Per Unit.semantic_description: The cost of a single unit of the item sold.

Total Spent.semantic_description: The total amount spent on the transaction, calculated as the product of quantity and price per unit.

Payment Method.semantic_description: The method used by the customer to pay for the transaction, e.g., cash, credit card.

Location.semantic_description: The physical outlet or cafe location where the transaction took place.

Transaction Date.semantic_description: The date on which the transaction was completed.

dirty_cafe_sales.description: This table captures individual sales transactions at a cafe, detailing each item sold, the quantity, total spent, and associated transaction metadata such as payment method and location.

database_description: The database serves as a transactional record system for a cafe, enabling analysis of sales patterns, understanding of customer purchasing behavior, and operational insights into different locations.
